item.title: Insights
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Page Load Issue Investigation Summary: The company is investigating slow page loads on the insights landing page. No major outage or incident has been reported.

Feb 29, 16:35 UTC
Resolved - Insights pages have recovered and should be operating normally.

Feb 29, 16:22 UTC
Investigating - We currently investigating an issue with slow page loads on the insights landing page.

item.title: Jobs via GitHub App integration are not being triggered
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - GitHub App Integration Issue Observed

Summary: We are currently investigating an issue where pipelines via GitHub App integration are not triggering jobs. Please refer to the provided documentation page to check if you are affected.

Feb 26, 18:09 UTC
Investigating - We are observing an issue where pipelines via GitHub App integration are not triggering jobs.

To check if this affects you please observe this documentation page:
https://circleci.com/docs/github-apps-integration/

item.title: Users Unable To Create New Orgs Or Projects
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Organization and Project Creation Issue

Summary: Users are currently unable to create new organizations or projects in CircleCI. The company is actively investigating the cause of this issue.

Feb 22, 18:10 UTC
Investigating - We are currently seeing an issue where users are unable to create new organizations or projects in CircleCI. We are investigating the cause of this issue

item.title: Bitbucket workflows are failing
item.content:encoded:
Output: [High] - Bitbucket Workflow Failures

Summary: Customers using Bitbucket may experience workflow failures due to issues with contexts.

Feb 22, 09:05 UTC
Identified - We are experiencing an issue where customer using Bitbucket may see failures for workflows that use contexts.

item.title: Brownout: Deprecating Android Images
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Android Image Deprecation Summary: CircleCI will be conducting brownouts for certain Android images and removing them from their platform on Sept 30, 2024. For more information, refer to the provided Discuss post.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 18, 00:00 UTC  -  Sep 19, 00:00 UTC

Jan 19, 18:13 UTC
Scheduled - We are conducting brownouts for the following Android images on CircleCI and will be removing them from our platform on Sept 30, 2024:

android:202102-01
android:2021.12.1
android:2022.01.1
android:2022.03.1
android:2022.04.1
android:2022.06.1
android:2022.06.2
android:2022.07.1
android:2022.08.1
android:2022.09.1
android:2023.03.1
android:2023.04.1
android:2023.06.1
android:2023.07.1
android:2023.09.1
android:2023.11.1

https://discuss.circleci.com/t/android-image-deprecations-and-eol-for-2024/50180

item.title: Delays in Jobs Starting
item.content:encoded:
Feb 14, 17:34 UTC
Resolved - We are no longer seeing a queue for job starts. We will mark this as resolved.

Feb 14, 17:13 UTC
Monitoring - We are currently seeing job start times recover. We will continue to monitor.

Feb 14, 16:50 UTC
Investigating - We are currently seeing a delay in jobs starting. We are currently investigating.
